perfect system. I'm ready for whatever you throw at me....

Also the E-Class is heavily flawed. open front end, no armor between nacelles and fuselage, not enough fuel... it was supposed to be just a test but it worked so well.

Moral: Fear my next ship, the Lorde Class Light Cruiser.

Edited October 6, 2013 by zekes

Remember when I said I can do a hit and run

If you guys want to, who ever has one last ship can opt to let me attack one but only if they are out numbered or out of missiles and i wont do it if its a game winning/player eliminating kill

Also you would have to tell me to do it

This can only be done once by one person as well not once for everyone

I will only do it if you all agree to let me, but I can't do a full fledged battle right now
